cab.content: From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 28t/i July 1919. , (Received 28th, 10 pan.) 10973. Following from; Grant, 26th July :-" Chief Afghan representative sent me a letter last night saying (? politely) that owing to pressure of work for Kabul, afore-mentioned, he would not have papers ready for meeting to-day. I have asked them to (? attend) to-morrow (? instead) at eleven."
